The author of the manga "MUSASHI NO KEN", Motoka Murakami also wrote a
mang=
a called "RON" you can view scans and translations
http://www.geocities.com=
/studentkendo/ron.htm

Nobuhiro Watsuki seems to be similar to Motoka Murak=
ami, both manga
artists/writers skillfully incorporate historical figures i=
nto their
fictional works...if you read the scans above you'll find out tha=
t the
hero is defeated by a man, Takaharu Naito (he looks almost exactly th=
e
way he was portrayed in the manga as he does in real life), who was
forme=
rly a kendo instructor in the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Dept.

is birth until young adulthood, as he

e top kendo

> which a swordsman named Yamamoto Chujiro is practicing=

> tsuki (thrust) on an empty can hung by a string. One
> day, an old man t=
ries to do it. The can doesn't even
> move, so Yamamoto thinks he missed. B=

at the old man was none other than
> Saitou Hajime himself. :)

whether this has anything to do with the real

it, but I was amused to

nime
> I've read/seen.
